eating_cheerios1.description: Felix can expertly pick up small objects between his thumb and index finger.
eating_cheerios1.title: Eating Cheerios 1

eating_cheerios2.description: Maintaining his pincer grasp all the way to his mouth... perfect form!
eating_cheerios2.title: Eating Cheerios 2

eating_peach.description: Peaches are yummy, but they are too slippery to pick up. Felix eats bits of fruits off Lucie's fingers, zoo-animal-feeding-style.
eating_peach.title: Eating Peach

eating_sippy_cup.description: A little thirsty? No problem! Felix picks up his sippy cup and holds it to his mouth, single-handledly.
eating_sippy_cup.title: Eating Sippy Cup

eating_spoon1.description: Sometimes, Felix doesn't feel like being passively spoon-fed. He grabs the spoon and shows us how it's done.
eating_spoon1.title: Eating Spoon 1

eating_spoon2.description: Once he has lathered his face with food, though, he is happy for us to take over and actually get some food IN him.
eating_spoon2.title: Eating Spoon 2

eating_spoon3.description: Have you seen my nice teeth?
eating_spoon3.title: Eating Spoon 3

eating_spoon4.description: If we put food on the spoon, and the spoon into the bowl (secured to the tray by a suction cup), Felix quickly pounces on the spoon and brings it to his mouth. However, he hasn't figure out how to reload the spoon.
eating_spoon4.title: Eating Spoon 4

grocery_shopping.description: Grocery shopping is one of his favorite activities... everything is so colorful! Hey mom, how about some bananas?
grocery_shopping.title: Grocery Shopping

gymboree1.description: This week, Felix (in orange shirt) tried out a Gymboree class. It's a place filled with baby-friendly stuff and semi-organized activities. Jasper (in dark blue shirt) and his mom Hazel (left) joined the fun.
gymboree1.title: Gymboree 1

gymboree2.description: Evan and his dad Jason (center) are regulars.
gymboree2.title: Gymboree 2

gymboree3.description: Felix got a chance to satisfy his urge to climb. Everything is padded in thick foam.
gymboree3.title: Gymboree 3

gymboree5.description: Felix quickly figured out how to climb up the stairs. His technique to go back down isn't so great (he trustingly lunges toward mom).
gymboree5.title: Gymboree 5

gymboree6.description: Babies were instructed to stay on their back for the parachute ride, but bad boys Jasper and Felix would have none of it.
gymboree6.title: Gymboree 6

knitting1.description: Lucie and Felix working on a sweater for Dean.
knitting1.title: Knitting 1

park_dolores1.description: Felix is loving the playground more and more. Here he is at Dolores Park, climbing away, with a little help from dad.
park_dolores1.title: Park Dolores 1

park_dolores2.description: Felix often raises one arm high in the air. We haven't figured out whether he is trying to communicate something.
park_dolores2.title: Park Dolores 2

park_precita.description: Felix climbing over the ledge of the sand box, at Precita Park.
park_precita.title: Park Precita

description: Felix is getting interested in self-feeding. He is very adept at picking up Cheerios, but not so good yet at holding the spoon... we are doing lots of laundry.
title: September 8
